Subjects: Vincent, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Vincent in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
[Þ]Is name vincensius to sayIs man þat ourcumys
                    ay…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…of þis lyf þat we ma twynebath but det & dedly
                    syne
